headline: PSE&G Installs More Than 2 Million Smart Meters - Continues on Path To Enhance Customer Experience and Support More Efficient Outage Recovery
summary: Originally published on PSEG NewsRoom NEWARK, NJ / ACCESSWIRE / January 16, 2025 / PSE&G reached a key milestone by installing more than 2 million smart meters as part of its Smart Meter Program aimed at enhancing customer insights and supporting ...
